constantValues: Potential revenue-generating event, or sale to an account, which needs to be tracked through a sales process to completion.

members.name: opportunityId
members.description: Unique identifier of the opportunity.

members.name: emailAddress

constantValues: The primary email address for the entity.

members.description: The primary email address for the entity.

members.name: name

constantValues: Type a subject or descriptive name, such as the expected order or company name, for the opportunity.

members.description: Type a subject or descriptive name, such as the expected order or company name, for the opportunity.

members.name: processId

constantValues: Contains the id of the process associated with the entity.

members.description: Contains the id of the process associated with the entity.

members.name: stageId

constantValues: Contains the id of the stage where the entity is located.

members.description: Contains the id of the stage where the entity is located.

members.name: traversedPath

constantValues: A comma separated list of string values representing the unique identifiers of stages in a Business Process Flow Instance in the order that they occur.

members.description: A comma separated list of string values representing the unique identifiers of stages in a Business Process Flow Instance in the order that they occur.

members.name: actualCloseDate

constantValues: Shows the date and time when the opportunity was closed or canceled.

members.description: Shows the date and time when the opportunity was closed or canceled.

members.name: actualValue

constantValues: Type the actual revenue amount for the opportunity for reporting and analysis of estimated versus actual sales. Field defaults to the Est. Revenue value when an opportunity is won.

members.description: Type the actual revenue amount for the opportunity for reporting and analysis of estimated versus actual sales. Field defaults to the Est. Revenue value when an opportunity is won.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: id

constantValues: Choose the local currency for the record to make sure budgets are reported in the correct currency.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Choose the local currency for the record to make sure budgets are reported in the correct currency.

members.name: exchangeRate

constantValues: Shows the conversion rate of the record's currency. The exchange rate is used to convert all money fields in the record from the local currency to the system's default currency.

members.description: Shows the conversion rate of the record's currency. The exchange rate is used to convert all money fields in the record from the local currency to the system's default currency.

members.name: actualValueBase

constantValues: Value of the Actual Revenue in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Actual Revenue in base currency.

members.name: budgetAmount

constantValues: Type a value between 0 and 1,000,000,000,000 to indicate the lead's potential available budget.

members.description: Type a value between 0 and 1,000,000,000,000 to indicate the lead's potential available budget.

members.name: budgetAmountBase

constantValues: Value of the Budget Amount in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Budget Amount in base currency.

members.name: budgetStatus

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

constantValues: Select the likely budget status for the lead's company. This may help determine the lead rating or your sales approach.

members.description: Select the likely budget status for the lead's company. This may help determine the lead rating or your sales approach.

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'budgetStatus_display' is added to the 'Opportunity' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'budgetStatus'
addSupportingAttribute.name: budgetStatus_display

members.name: closeProbability

constantValues: Type a number from 0 to 100 that represents the likelihood of closing the opportunity. This can aid the sales team in their efforts to convert the opportunity in a sale.

members.description: Type a number from 0 to 100 that represents the likelihood of closing the opportunity. This can aid the sales team in their efforts to convert the opportunity in a sale.

members.name: completeInternalReview

constantValues: Select whether an internal review has been completed for this opportunity.

members.description: Select whether an internal review has been completed for this opportunity.

members.name: confirmInterest

constantValues: Select whether the lead confirmed interest in your offerings. This helps in determining the lead quality and the probability of it turning into an opportunity.

members.description: Select whether the lead confirmed interest in your offerings. This helps in determining the lead quality and the probability of it turning into an opportunity.

members.name: currentSituation

constantValues: Type notes about the company or organization associated with the opportunity.

members.description: Type notes about the company or organization associated with the opportunity.

members.name: customerNeed

constantValues: Type some notes about the customer's requirements, to help the sales team identify products and services that could meet their requirements.

members.description: Type some notes about the customer's requirements, to help the sales team identify products and services that could meet their requirements.

members.name: customerPainPoints

constantValues: Type notes about the customer's pain points to help the sales team identify products and services that could address these pain points.

members.description: Type notes about the customer's pain points to help the sales team identify products and services that could address these pain points.

members.name: decisionMaker

constantValues: Select whether your notes include information about who makes the purchase decisions at the lead's company.

members.description: Select whether your notes include information about who makes the purchase decisions at the lead's company.

members.name: description

constantValues: Type additional information to describe the opportunity, such as possible products to sell or past purchases from the customer.

members.description: Type additional information to describe the opportunity, such as possible products to sell or past purchases from the customer.

members.name: developProposal

constantValues: Select whether a proposal has been developed for the opportunity.

members.description: Select whether a proposal has been developed for the opportunity.

members.name: discountAmount

constantValues: Type the discount amount for the opportunity if the customer is eligible for special savings.

members.description: Type the discount amount for the opportunity if the customer is eligible for special savings.

members.name: discountAmountBase

constantValues: Value of the Opportunity Discount Amount in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Opportunity Discount Amount in base currency.

members.name: discountPercentage

constantValues: Type the discount rate that should be applied to the Product Totals field to include additional savings for the customer in the opportunity.

members.description: Type the discount rate that should be applied to the Product Totals field to include additional savings for the customer in the opportunity.

members.name: estimatedCloseDate

constantValues: Enter the expected closing date of the opportunity to help make accurate revenue forecasts.

members.description: Enter the expected closing date of the opportunity to help make accurate revenue forecasts.

members.name: estimatedValue

constantValues: Type the estimated revenue amount to indicate the potential sale or value of the opportunity for revenue forecasting. This field can be either system-populated or editable based on the selection in the Revenue field.

members.description: Type the estimated revenue amount to indicate the potential sale or value of the opportunity for revenue forecasting. This field can be either system-populated or editable based on the selection in the Revenue field.

members.name: estimatedValueBase

constantValues: Value of the Est. Revenue in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Est. Revenue in base currency.

members.name: evaluateFit

constantValues: Select whether the fit between the lead's requirements and your offerings was evaluated.

members.description: Select whether the fit between the lead's requirements and your offerings was evaluated.

members.name: resolveFeedback

constantValues: Choose whether the proposal feedback has been captured and resolved for the opportunity.

members.description: Choose whether the proposal feedback has been captured and resolved for the opportunity.

members.name: fileDebrief

constantValues: Choose whether the sales team has recorded detailed notes on the proposals and the account's responses.

members.description: Choose whether the sales team has recorded detailed notes on the proposals and the account's responses.

members.name: completeFinalProposal

constantValues: Select whether a final proposal has been completed for the opportunity.

members.description: Select whether a final proposal has been completed for the opportunity.

members.name: finalDecisionDate

constantValues: Enter the date and time when the final decision of the opportunity was made.

members.description: Enter the date and time when the final decision of the opportunity was made.

constantValues: Type the cost of freight or shipping for the products included in the opportunity for use in calculating the Total Amount field.

members.description: Type the cost of freight or shipping for the products included in the opportunity for use in calculating the Total Amount field.

constantValues: Value of the Freight Amount in base currency.

members.name: totalAmount

constantValues: Shows the total amount due, calculated as the sum of the products, discounts, freight, and taxes for the opportunity.

members.description: Shows the total amount due, calculated as the sum of the products, discounts, freight, and taxes for the opportunity.

members.name: totalAmountBase

constantValues: Value of the Total Amount in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Total Amount in base currency.

members.name: totalAmountLessFreight

constantValues: Shows the total product amount for the opportunity, minus any discounts. This value is added to freight and tax amounts in the calculation for the total amount of the opportunity.

members.description: Shows the total product amount for the opportunity, minus any discounts. This value is added to freight and tax amounts in the calculation for the total amount of the opportunity.

members.name: totalAmountLessFreightBase

constantValues: Value of the Total Pre-Freight Amount in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Total Pre-Freight Amount in base currency.

members.name: totalDiscountAmount

constantValues: Shows the total discount amount, based on the discount price and rate entered on the opportunity.

members.description: Shows the total discount amount, based on the discount price and rate entered on the opportunity.

members.name: totalDiscountAmountBase

constantValues: Value of the Total Discount Amount in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Total Discount Amount in base currency.

members.name: totalLineItemAmount

constantValues: Shows the sum of all existing and write-in products included on the opportunity, based on the specified price list and quantities.

members.description: Shows the sum of all existing and write-in products included on the opportunity, based on the specified price list and quantities.

members.name: totalLineItemAmountBase

constantValues: Value of the Total Detail Amount in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Total Detail Amount in base currency.

members.name: totalLineItemDiscountAmount

constantValues: Shows the total of the Manual Discount amounts specified on all products included in the opportunity. This value is reflected in the Total Detail Amount field on the opportunity and is added to any discount amount or rate specified on the opportunity.

members.description: Shows the total of the Manual Discount amounts specified on all products included in the opportunity. This value is reflected in the Total Detail Amount field on the opportunity and is added to any discount amount or rate specified on the opportunity.

members.name: totalLineItemDiscountAmountBase

constantValues: Value of the Total Line Item Discount Amount in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Total Line Item Discount Amount in base currency.

members.name: totalTax

constantValues: Shows the total of the Tax amounts specified on all products included in the opportunity, included in the Total Amount field calculation for the opportunity.

members.description: Shows the total of the Tax amounts specified on all products included in the opportunity, included in the Total Amount field calculation for the opportunity.

members.name: totalTaxBase

constantValues: Value of the Total Tax in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Total Tax in base currency.

members.description: Select whether information about competitors is included.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: id

constantValues: Choose the lead that the opportunity was created from for reporting and analytics. The field is read-only after the opportunity is created and defaults to the correct lead when an opportunity is created from a converted lead.

constantValues: Unique identifier of the contact associated with the opportunity.

constantValues: Shows the campaign that the opportunity was created from. The ID is used for tracking the success of the campaign.

definitions.description: Potential revenue-generating event, or sale to an account, which needs to be tracked through a sales process to completion.
